title: VMware Solutions docs
introduction: VMware Solutions is an IBM Cloud offering that provides deployment and management of VMware virtualized environments. Learn how to make the most of your VMware Solutions experience by using the docs, API doc reference, solution architectures, and solution guides.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with VMware Solutions
section_recommended.description: Get familiar with the process of ordering an instance and some services for it.

section_recommended.title: Signing up for required accounts
section_recommended.description: Sign up for an IBM Cloud account and an IBM Cloud infrastructure account.

section_recommended.title: Accessing the VMware Solutions console
section_recommended.description: Review the entry points into the IBM Cloud for VMware Solutions console.

section_recommended.title: Setting up your environment for your first order
section_recommended.description: Ensure that your environment is ready for your order.

section_recommended.title: Ordering services for vCenter Server instances
section_recommended.description: Order services for your VMware vCenter Server instances, such as a disaster recovery solution.

tiles.title: Price calculation updates
tiles.description: Price calculations are now automatically generated when you access the VMware vCenter Server instance order page.

tiles.title: VMware vCloud Director upgrade for VMware Solutions Shared
tiles.description: VMware Solutions provides an upgrade to the Shared infrastructure to the latest version of VMware vCloud Director (vCD) v10.3.2.
